name: daadaar
description: Decentralized, anonymous platform for exposing government injustices in Iran

scripts.build: bun run --filter frontend build && bun run --filter backend build
scripts.build:frontend: bun run --filter frontend build && vercel deploy --prod --cwd frontend/ --yes
scripts.type-check: bun run --filter frontend type-check && bun run --filter backend type-check
scripts.test: bun run --filter frontend test && bun run --filter backend test
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/.next frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules shared/node_modules node_modules
